document_data.name: Painbliss Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Painbliss Hall''' was a temple dedicated to [[Loviatar]] located in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: Painbliss Hall was located on [[Westlight Walk]] in the northwest section of the city.
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Whipmistress [[Spyrytara Xalass]]. Spyrytara was assisted by 27 other priestesses and 34 followers.
